job.description: JOB TITLE:Â Senior Software EngineerLOCATION:Â San Diego, CA or RemoteÂ Role Summary:Our client has secured a long-term engagement being tasked with redesigning and modernizing the companyâs legacy Health & Wellness platform across both web and mobile. The new platform will incorporate new features and functionality, such as health risk assessments, rewards program for active lifestyle, and real-time coaching provided via integrated video capabilities.Our clientâs team supporting this engagement is made up of UX Designers, Front-End Web Developers, Full Stack Developers, Technical Leads, Architects, iOS Developers and Android Developers. This person will also spearhead and advocate new technical solutions for the client.Â Essential Duties and Responsibilities:Perform hands-on, full stack software development with .Net, React and cloud-based technologiesCollaborate and liaise with current customer stakeholders on proposed architecturesProvide direction on architecting .NET solutions across multiple platforms.Documentation of solutions (e.g. architecture, configuration and setup).Working within a project management/agile delivery methodology in a leading role as part ofÂ a wider team.Ability to collaborate with nearshore/offshore developers as needed.Â Qualifications:10+ years of software development experience, with a focus on Full-stack and .NET technologyDirect experience deploying software to the cloud (Azure, AWS and/or GCP)Direct experience assembling micro-services-based application architecture.Experience with selecting persistence and caching solutions, database design and data modelingExperience in performance analysis and tuning a plusDeep understanding of programming best practices and modern architectural patterns,including micro services and message-driven architectures.Current hands-on developing / coding role.
